description.value: A set of codes that classify the person according to their own perceived ethnic group and cultural background. These codes and their descriptions represent concepts used in Scotland and are copied from the content of the [NHS Scotland Data Dictionary Ethnic Group](https://www.ndc.scot.nhs.uk/Dictionary-A-Z/Definitions/index.asp?Search=E&ID=243&Title=Ethnic%20Group) web page on 10/09/2021.
